pullRequest.title: Fix format problem in composite of unmapped
pullRequest.bodyText:
When a composite aggregation is reduced using the results from an
index that has one of the fields unmapped we were throwing away the
formatter. This is mildly annoying, except in the case of IP addresses
which were coming out as non-utf-8-characters. And tripping assertions.
This carefully preserves the formatter from the working bucket.
Closes #50600

commit.message:
Fix format problem in composite of unmapped

When a composite aggregation is reduced using the results from an
index that has one of the fields unmapped we were throwing away the
formatter. This is mildly annoying, except in the case of IP addresses
which were coming out as non-utf-8-characters. And tripping assertions.

This carefully preserves the formatter from the working bucket.

Closes #50600

nodes.bodyText: I added these to help with debugging and figure they are probably fine to keep.

commit.message: Skip old versions because it isn't fixed there

nodes.bodyText: Thank you for including a note of what we're testing, helps so much when debugging test failures!
